record.field: gross = categories['GROSS'] if contract.employee_id.is_non_resident and contract.l10n_nl_30_percent: gross *= 0.70 rates = payslip._rule_parameter('l10n_nl_social_security_rates_employee')['AOW'] result_rate = -(rates[1] if contract.employee_id.is_non_resident else rates[0]) cap = rates[2] / 12 result = min(gross, cap)

gross = categories['GROSS'] if contract.employee_id.is_non_resident and contract.l10n_nl_30_percent: gross *= 0.70 result = gross + categories['DED']
